TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 97
TEI.2.document_title: Will C Carr to Moses Austin, 06-16-1805

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 97

div1.p: Please to pay Major Seth Hunt fifty nine dollars and seventy nine cents and place the same to the account of Sir Yours etc.. St. Genevieve 16 June 1805
